tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE athlete_health_management (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_name VARCHAR(50),
    injury_description TEXT,
    recovery_timeline DATE,
    treatment_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE athlete_injuries (
  athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  injury_type VARCHAR(50),
  injury_description TEXT,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_plan TEXT,
  recovery_timeline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recovery_timeline (
  recovery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  injury_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  recovery_status VARCHAR(20),
  recovery_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES athlete_injuries(athlete_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (injury_id) REFERENCES athlete_injuries(injury_id)
);

CREATE TABLE athletes (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE injuries (
    injury_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    injury_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    injury_date DATE,
    recovery_time INT
);

CREATE TABLE treatment_plans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    treatment_description TEXT,
    treatment_start_date DATE,
    treatment_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Athletes (
  athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Injuries (
  injury_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT,
  injury_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  injury_date DATE,
  recovery_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentPlans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  injury_id INT,
  treatment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE RecoveryTimelines (
  timeline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  injury_id INT,
  recovery_date DATE,
  recovery_progress VARCHAR(100),
  remarks TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Injuries (
    injury_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    injury_type VARCHAR,
    injury_date DATE,
    recovery_time INT
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentPlans (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_id INT,
    treatment_type VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
